synopsis.text: Long dormant for 820 years, the enigmatic and formidable Noblesse, Cadis Etrama di Raizel, awakens in modern-day South Korea. To acclimate to the contemporary world and its advancements, he assumes the guise of a high school student, attending Ye Ran High School where his faithful servant Frankenstein serves as the principal. As Raizel immerses himself in the daily lives of his human peers, forming friendships along the way, his tranquil existence is disrupted by the emergence of a menacing organization known as the 'Unions.' With the help of Frankenstein, Raizel must safeguard his newfound friends from these supernatural adversaries while unveiling his own mysterious past. Join Raizel in Noblesse as he navigates the complexities of high school life, forging friendships, and battling sinister forces threatening the peace of Korea.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
